80 /*
81 
82  Informationen
83  =-=-=-=-=-=-=
84 
85  Thread-safety & locking
86 
87  Alle durch die Schnittstelle nach aussen angebotenen Funktionen, werden
88  gegen Reentrance grob-granular mittels eines kritischen Bereiches gesperrt.
89  Damit sind auch parallele Calls auf unterschiedliche Methoden der Klasse
90  unterbunden. Sollte dies zu Performance-Problemen führen, kann ein
91  verfeinerter Locking-Mechanismus entwickelt werden. Zunächst mal aber so.
92 
93 
94  TODO: Überall sicherstellen, das ITAExceptions zu VAExceptions umgebaut werden!!!
95 
96  */
97 
98 
99 // --= Hilfsmakros =--
100 
101 // Überprüfung ob Initialisiert
102 #define VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED \
103 { if (m_iState != VA_CORESTATE_READY) VA_EXCEPT2(MODAL_ERROR, "Core not initialized"); }
104 
105 // Mutex-Lock welches parallelen Methoden-Mehrfracheintritt (reentrance) im Methoden-Scope verhindert
106 #define VA_NO_REENTRANCE \
107 ITACriticalSectionLock oReentranceLock(m_csReentrance)
108 
109 // Manuelles das Lock gegen parallelen Methoden-Mehrfracheintritt (reentrance) holen
110 #define VA_LOCK_REENTRANCE \
111 m_csReentrance.enter()
112 
113 // Manuelle das Lock gegen parallelen Methoden-Mehrfracheintritt (reentrance) freigeben
114 #define VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE \
115 m_csReentrance.leave()
116 
117 /*
118 
119  Sichere Ausnahmebehandlung
120 
121  Problem: Intern können auch andere Typen von Ausnahmen als
122  CVAException geworfen werden. Nach aussen hin dürfen
123  aber NUR CVAExceptions geworfen werden (Konsistent)
124 
125  Lösung: TRY-/CATCH-Makros für abgesicherte Bereiche in allen Methoden
126  der externen Schnittstelle. Zweistufiger Aufbau.
127  1. (innen) Fange alle Exception-Typen und konvertiere sie in CVAExceptions
128  2. (aussen) Fange die einzig mögl. CVAExceptions und biete
129  gemeinsamen Catch-Weg zur Problemlösung (Aufräumen) an
130 
131  try {
132  try {
133  // Code ...
134  } catch (ITAException& e) {
135  // Konvertiere zu CVAException
136  } catch (VistaExceptionBase& e) {
137  // Konvertiere zu CVAException
138  } catch (...)
139  // Generiere unerwartete CVAException
140  }
141  } catch (CVAException& e) {
142  // Gemeinsames Aufräumen
143  }
144 
145  Beispiel:
146 
147  VA_TRY {
148  // Code ..
149  } VA_CATCH {
150  // Mach was ...
151  }
152 
153  Hinweis: Initiale/finale Geschweifte Klammer fehlen, da diese hinter die Makros geschrieben werden
154 
155  */
156 
157 #define VA_TRY \
158 try { try
159 
160 #define VA_CATCH(EXPR) \
161 catch( CVAException& e ) { throw e; } \
162 catch( ITAException& e ) { throw convert2VAException( e ); } \
163 catch( VistaExceptionBase& e ) { throw convert2VAException( e ); } \
164 catch( ... ) { throw getDefaultUnexpectedVAException(); } \
165 } catch( CVAException& EXPR )
166 
167 #define VA_FINALLY \
168 catch( CVAException& e ) { throw e; } \
169 catch( ITAException& e ) { throw convert2VAException( e ); } \
170 catch( VistaExceptionBase& e ) { throw convert2VAException(e); } \
171 catch( ... ) { throw getDefaultUnexpectedVAException(); } \
172 } catch( ... )
173 
174 #define VA_RETHROW \
175 catch( CVAException& e ) { throw e; } \
176 catch( ITAException& e ) { throw convert2VAException( e ); } \
177 catch( VistaExceptionBase& e ) { throw convert2VAException( e ); } \
178 catch( ... ) { throw getDefaultUnexpectedVAException(); } \
179 } catch( ... ) { throw; }
180

188 IVAInterface* VACore::CreateCoreInstance( const std::string& sConfigFile )
189 {
190  CVAStruct oFinalCoreConfigStruct, oCurrentConfig;
191  std::list< VistaFileSystemFile > voConfigFiles;
192  std::vector< VistaFileSystemDirectory > voIncludePaths;
193  voConfigFiles.push_back( VistaFileSystemFile( sConfigFile ) );
194 
195  VA_PRINT( "VA working directory: '" << VistaFileSystemDirectory::GetCurrentWorkingDirectory() << "'" );
196 
197  while( voConfigFiles.empty() == false )
198  {
199  VistaFileSystemFile oCurrentConfigFile( voConfigFiles.front() );
200  voConfigFiles.pop_front();
201 
202  if( oCurrentConfigFile.Exists() == false )
203  {
204  for( size_t n = 0; n < voIncludePaths.size(); n++ )
205  {
206  std::string sCombinedFilePath = voIncludePaths[ n ].GetName() + PATH_SEPARATOR + oCurrentConfigFile.GetLocalName();
207  oCurrentConfigFile.SetName( sCombinedFilePath );
208  if( oCurrentConfigFile.Exists() && oCurrentConfigFile.IsFile() )
209  {
210  VA_INFO( "Config", "Including further configuration file '" + oCurrentConfigFile.GetLocalName() +
211  "' from include path '" + voIncludePaths[ n ].GetName() + "'" );
212  break;
213  }
214  }
215 
216  if( !oCurrentConfigFile.Exists() )
217  {
218  VA_EXCEPT2( FILE_NOT_FOUND, "Configuration file '" + oCurrentConfigFile.GetLocalName() + "' not found, aborting." );
219  }
220  }
221 
222  VA_VERBOSE( "Config", std::string( "Reading INI file '" ) + oCurrentConfigFile.GetLocalName() + "'" );
223  readINIFileAsStruct( oCurrentConfigFile.GetName(), oCurrentConfig );
224 
225  if( oCurrentConfig.HasKey( "paths" ) )
226  {
227  const CVAStruct& oPaths( oCurrentConfig[ "paths" ] );
228  CVAStruct::const_iterator it = oPaths.Begin();
229  while( it != oPaths.End() )
230  {
231  const CVAStructValue& oIncludePath( ( it++ )->second );
232  VistaFileSystemDirectory oNewPathDir( oIncludePath );
233  if( oNewPathDir.Exists() && oNewPathDir.IsDirectory() )
234  voIncludePaths.push_back( oNewPathDir );
235  }
236  }
237 
238  if( oCurrentConfig.HasKey( "files" ) )
239  {
240  const CVAStruct& oPaths( oCurrentConfig[ "files" ] );
241  CVAStruct::const_iterator it = oPaths.Begin();
242  while( it != oPaths.End() )
243  {
244  const CVAStructValue& oIncludeFile( ( it++ )->second );
245 
246  voConfigFiles.push_back( VistaFileSystemFile( oIncludeFile ) );
247  }
248  }
249 
250  oCurrentConfig.RemoveKey( "files" );
251 
252  // Merge structs (check for uniqueness)
253  oFinalCoreConfigStruct.Merge( oCurrentConfig, true );
254  }
255 
256  return CreateCoreInstance( oFinalCoreConfigStruct );
257 }

264 std::string VACore::GetCoreLibFilePath()
265 {
266 #ifdef WIN32
267  CHAR pszPath[ MAX_PATH + 1 ] = { 0 };
268  GetModuleFileNameA( ( HINSTANCE ) &__ImageBase, pszPath, _countof( pszPath ) );
269  return std::string( pszPath );
270 #else
271  VA_EXCEPT2( NOT_IMPLEMENTED, "This function is not implemented for your platform. Sorry." );
272  return "";
273 #endif // WIN32
274 }

276 CVACoreImpl::CVACoreImpl( const CVAStruct& oArgs )
277  : m_pAudioDriverBackend( nullptr ),
278  m_pGlobalSamplePool( nullptr ),
279  m_pGlobalSampler( nullptr ),
280  m_pSignalSourceMan( nullptr ),
281  m_pDirMan( nullptr ),
282  m_pSceneMan( nullptr ),
283  m_pNewSceneState( nullptr ),
284  m_iCurActiveSoundReceiver( -1 ),
285  m_iNewActiveSoundReceiver( -1 ),
286  m_iUpdActiveSoundReceiver( -1 ),
287  m_pCoreEventMan( nullptr ),
288  m_pCoreThread( nullptr ),
289  m_pInputAmp( nullptr ),
290  m_pR2RPatchbay( nullptr ),
291  m_pOutputPatchbay( nullptr ),
292  m_pInputStreamDetector( nullptr ),
293  m_pOutputStreamDetector( nullptr ),
294  m_pOutputTracker( nullptr ),
295  m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput( nullptr ),
296  m_pStreamProbeFinal( nullptr ),
297  m_pCurSceneState( nullptr ),
298  m_pClock( ITAClock::getDefaultClock() ),
299  m_pTicker( NULL ),
300  m_lSyncModOwner( -1 ),
301  m_lSyncModSpinCount( 0 ),
302  m_iState( VA_CORESTATE_CREATED ),
303 
304  // TODO: Welche Default-Wert müssen erst in Initialize gesetzt werden?
305  m_iGlobalAuralizationMode( IVAInterface::VA_AURAMODE_ALL ),
306  m_dOutputGain( 1 ), m_dInputGain( 1 ),
307  m_bOutputMuted( false ), m_bInputMuted( false ),
308  m_dStreamClockOffset( 0 ), m_fCoreClockOffset( 0 ),
309 
310  // --= Profiling =--
311  m_pmCoreThreadLoopTotalDuration( "Core thread loop" )
312 {
313  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
314 
315  VA_TRY
316  {
317  // read configuration
318  m_oCoreConfig.Init( oArgs );
319 
320  // register core itself as a module
321  SetObjectName( "VACore" );
322  m_oModules.RegisterObject( this );
323  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Registered core module with name '" << GetObjectName() << "'" );
324 
325  // Der Event-Manager muss immer verfügbar sein,
326  // unabhänging davon ob der Core initialisiert wurde oder nicht.
327  m_pCoreEventMan = new CVACoreEventManager;
328 
329  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_CREATED;
330 
331  VA_TRACE( "Core", "CVACoreImpl instance created [" << this << "]" );
332 
333  }
334  VA_RETHROW;
335 }

337 CVACoreImpl::~CVACoreImpl()
338 {
339  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
340 
341  // Implizit finalisieren, falls dies nicht durch den Benutzer geschah
342  if( m_iState == VA_CORESTATE_READY )
343  {
344  VA_TRY
345  {
346  Finalize();
347  }
348  VA_FINALLY
349  {
350  // Fehler beim Finalisieren ignorieren
351  };
352  }
353 
354  // Nachricht senden [blocking], das die Kerninstanz gelöscht wird.
355  CVAEvent ev;
356  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_DESTROY;
357  ev.pSender = this;
358  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvent( ev );
359 
360  // Module deregistrieren
361  m_oModules.Clear();
362 
363  // Nachrichten-Manager freigeben
364  VA_TRY
365  {
366  delete m_pCoreEventMan;
367  }
368  VA_RETHROW;
369 
370  VA_TRACE( "Core", "CVACoreImpl instance deleted [" << this << "]" );
371 
372  // Profiling ausgeben
373  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", m_pmCoreThreadLoopTotalDuration.ToString() );
374 }

382 void CVACoreImpl::GetVersionInfo( CVAVersionInfo* pVersionInfo ) const
383 {

389  pVersionInfo->sVersion = ss.str();

391 #ifdef VACORE_CMAKE_DATE
392  ss << VACORE_CMAKE_DATE;
393 #else
394  ss << "Unkown date";
395 #endif
396  pVersionInfo->sDate = ss.str();
397  pVersionInfo->sFlags = "";
398 
399 #ifdef DEBUG
400  pVersionInfo->sComments = "debug";
401 #else
402  pVersionInfo->sComments = "release";
403 #endif

432 void CVACoreImpl::Initialize() {
433  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
434 
435  // TODO: Prüfen ob im Fehlerfall zurück in den sauberen Grundzustand [WICHTIG!]
436 
437  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Initializing core" );
438 
439  VA_TRY
440  {
441  if( m_iState == VA_CORESTATE_READY )
442  VA_EXCEPT2( MODAL_ERROR, "Core already initialized." );
443 
444  if( m_iState == VA_CORESTATE_FAIL )
445  VA_EXCEPT2( MODAL_ERROR, "Core corrupted, reinitialization impossible" );
446 
447  m_pCoreThread = new CVACoreThread( this );
448 
449  SetProgress( "Setting up audio hardware", "", 1 );
450  InitializeAudioDriver();
451 
452  m_pR2RPatchbay = new ITAStreamPatchbay( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize );
453 
454  // Create output patch bay with a single output that uses all available physical audio outputs from sound card
455  m_pOutputPatchbay = new ITAStreamPatchbay( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize );
456  int iPhysicalHardwareOutput = m_pOutputPatchbay->AddOutput( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels );
457  m_pOutputPatchbay->SetOutputGain( iPhysicalHardwareOutput, m_dOutputGain );
458 
459  m_iGlobalAuralizationMode = VA_AURAMODE_ALL;
460 
461  // Set up input stream network
462  ITADatasource* pInputTail = nullptr;
463  if( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels > 0 )
464  {
465  pInputTail = m_pAudioDriverBackend->getInputStreamDatasource();
466  if( pInputTail )
467  {
468  m_pInputAmp = new ITAStreamAmplifier( pInputTail, ( float ) m_dInputGain );
469  m_pInputStreamDetector = new ITAStreamDetector( m_pInputAmp );
470  pInputTail = m_pInputStreamDetector;
471 
472  if( m_oCoreConfig.bRecordDeviceInputEnabled )
473  {
474  m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput = new ITAStreamProbe( pInputTail, m_oCoreConfig.sRecordDeviceInputFilePath );
475  pInputTail = m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput;
476  }
477  }
478  }
479 
480  SetProgress( "Setting up resource managers", "", 2 );
481 
482  m_pSignalSourceMan = new CVAAudioSignalSourceManager( this, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig, pInputTail );
483  m_pGlobalSamplePool = ITASoundSamplePool::Create( 1, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate );
484  m_pGlobalSampler = ITASoundSampler::Create( 1, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize, m_pGlobalSamplePool );
485  m_pGlobalSampler->AddMonoTrack();
486 
487  m_pDirMan = new CVADirectivityManager( this, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate );
488  m_pDirMan->Initialize();
489 
490  SetProgress( "Setting up scene management", "", 3 );
491 
492  m_pSceneMan = new CVASceneManager( m_pClock );
493  m_pSceneMan->Initialize();
494  m_pCurSceneState = m_pSceneMan->GetHeadSceneState();
495 
496  // Register all renderers and initialize
497  CVAAudioRendererRegistry::GetInstance()->RegisterInternalCoreFactoryMethods();
498  InitializeAudioRenderers();
499 
500  if( m_voRenderers.empty() )
501  VA_EXCEPT1( "No audio renderers created" );
502 
503  SetProgress( "Initializing reproduction modules", "", 6 );
504 
505  // Register all reproductions and initialize
506  CVAAudioReproductionModuleRegistry::GetInstance()->RegisterInternalCoreFactoryMethods();
507  InitializeReproductionModules();
508 
509  if( m_voReproductionModules.empty() )
510  VA_EXCEPT1( "No audio reproduction modules created" );
511 
512  // Patch renderer and reproduction modules
513  PatchRendererToReproductionModules();
514 
515  // Patch audio reproduction to output
516  // TODO:
517  //SetProgress( "Patching audio modules", "", 7 );
518  PatchReproductionModulesToOutput();
519 
520  /* Wire the global sampler (1:N)
521  int iGlobalSamplerInput = m_pOutputPatchbay->AddInput( m_pGlobalSampler );
522  int iNumPhysicalOutputChannels = m_pOutputPatchbay->GetOutputNumChannels( iPhysicalHardwareOutput );
523  for( int i=0; i<iNumPhysicalOutputChannels; i++ )
524  m_pOutputPatchbay->ConnectChannels( iGlobalSamplerInput, 0, iPhysicalHardwareOutput, i );
525  */
526 
527  // Create output peak detector that uses patch bay output stream
528  m_pOutputStreamDetector = new ITAStreamDetector( m_pOutputPatchbay->GetOutputDatasource( iPhysicalHardwareOutput ) );
529 
530  // Setup output dump (if set)
531  ITADatasource* pOutputTail = m_pOutputStreamDetector;
532  if( m_oCoreConfig.bRecordDeviceOutputEnabled )
533  {
534  m_pStreamProbeFinal = new ITAStreamProbe( pOutputTail, m_oCoreConfig.sRecordFinalOutputFilePath );
535  pOutputTail = m_pStreamProbeFinal;
536  }
537 
538  // Attach the stream tracker
539  m_pOutputTracker = new CVAAudiostreamTracker( pOutputTail, m_pClock, &m_fCoreClockOffset, &m_lSyncModOwner, m_pSignalSourceMan );
540  pOutputTail = m_pOutputTracker;
541 
542  // Give output stream datasource to audio driver
543  m_pAudioDriverBackend->setOutputStreamDatasource( pOutputTail );
544 
545  // Core-Clock auf 0 initialisieren
546  double dNow = m_pClock->getTime();
547  m_fCoreClockOffset = ( float ) dNow;
548  m_dStreamClockOffset = -1;
549 
550  // Timer erzeugen und konfigurieren (wird für Peak-Events benutzt)
551  m_pTicker = new VistaTicker();
552  m_pTicker->AddTrigger( new VistaTicker::TriggerContext( m_oCoreConfig.iTriggerUpdateMilliseconds, true ) );
553  m_pTicker->SetAfterPulseFunctor( this );
554 
555  // Audio-Streaming starten
556  SetProgress( "Starting audio streaming", "", 7 );
557  m_pAudioDriverBackend->startStreaming();
558 
559  // Timer für Peak-Events starten
560  m_pTicker->StartTicker();
561 
562  // Initialisierung erfolgreich!
563  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_READY;
564 
565  SetProgress( "Initialization finished", "", 8 );
566  FinishProgress();
567 
568  }
569  VA_FINALLY
570  {
571  // Aufräumen und Exception weiterwerfen
572  Tidyup();
573  throw;
574  }
575 }
576 
577 void CVACoreImpl::Reset()
578 {
579  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
580 
581  // Wait for core thread
582  while( !m_pCoreThread->TryBreak() )
583  VASleep( 20 );
584 
585  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
586 
587  if( GetUpdateLocked() )
588  {
589  VA_WARN( "Core", "Encountered locked scene during reset. Please unlock before resetting, skipping." );
590  m_pCoreThread->Continue();
591  }
592 
593  VA_TRY
594  {
595  VA_INFO( "Core", "Resetting core" );
596 
597  // Reset audio renderers
598  std::vector< CVAAudioRendererDesc >::iterator it = m_voRenderers.begin();
599  while( it != m_voRenderers.end() )
600  {
601  CVAAudioRendererDesc& oRend( *it++ );
602  oRend.pInstance->Reset();
603  }
604 
605  if( m_pCurSceneState )
606  {
607  // Referenz entfernen welche in CoreThreadLoop hinzugefügt wurde
608  m_pCurSceneState->RemoveReference();
609  m_pCurSceneState = nullptr;
610  }
611 
612  // Alle Szenenobjekte löschen
613  m_pSceneMan->Reset();
614  m_pSignalSourceMan->Reset();
615  m_pDirMan->Reset();
616 
617  // TODO: Check if the pool and sampler must really be recreated
618  /*
619  delete m_pGlobalSamplePool;
620  m_pGlobalSamplePool = nullptr;
621  m_pGlobalSamplePool = ITASoundSamplePool::Create(1, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSamplerate);
622 
623  // This causes a crash in patch bay
624  delete m_pGlobalSampler;
625  m_pGlobalSampler = nullptr;
626  m_pGlobalSampler = ITASoundSampler::Create(1, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSamplerate, m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize, m_pGlobalSamplePool);
627  m_pGlobalSampler->AddMonoTrack();
628  */
629  //m_pGlobalSampler->RemoveAllPlaybacks();
630 
631  // Werte neusetzen
632  m_pCurSceneState = m_pSceneMan->GetHeadSceneState();
633  m_iCurActiveSoundReceiver = -1;
634  m_iNewActiveSoundReceiver = -1;
635 
636  m_pCoreThread;
637 
638  // Core-Thread fortsetzen
639  m_pCoreThread->Continue();
640 
641  // Ereignis generieren, wenn Operation erfolgreich
642  CVAEvent ev;
643  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_RESET;
644  ev.pSender = this;
645  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvent( ev );
646 
647  }
648  VA_FINALLY
649  {
650  Tidyup();
651  throw;
652  }
653 }
654 
655 void CVACoreImpl::Tidyup() {
656  /*
657  * Hinweis: Diese Hilfsmethode wird nur innerhalb des Reentrance-Locks
658  * aufgerufen - daher keine weiter Absicherung nötig.
659  */
660 
661  VA_TRY
662  {
663  if( m_pTicker )
664  {
665  m_pTicker->StopTicker();
666  m_pTicker->SetAfterPulseFunctor( NULL );
667  }
668 
669  FinalizeAudioDriver();
670  FinalizeRenderingModules();
671  FinalizeReproductionModules();
672 
673  delete m_pTicker;
674  m_pTicker = nullptr;
675 
676  delete m_pCoreThread;
677  m_pCoreThread = nullptr;
678 
679  delete m_pInputAmp;
680  m_pInputAmp = nullptr;
681 
682  delete m_pInputStreamDetector;
683  m_pInputStreamDetector = nullptr;
684 
685  delete m_pR2RPatchbay;
686  m_pR2RPatchbay = nullptr;
687 
688  delete m_pOutputPatchbay;
689  m_pOutputPatchbay = nullptr;
690 
691  delete m_pOutputStreamDetector;
692  m_pOutputStreamDetector = nullptr;
693 
694  delete m_pOutputTracker;
695  m_pOutputTracker = nullptr;
696 
697  delete m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput;
698  m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput = nullptr;
699 
700  delete m_pStreamProbeFinal;
701  m_pStreamProbeFinal = nullptr;
702 
703  delete m_pSignalSourceMan;
704  m_pSignalSourceMan = nullptr;
705 
706  delete m_pGlobalSampler;
707  m_pGlobalSampler = nullptr;
708 
709  delete m_pGlobalSamplePool;
710  m_pGlobalSamplePool = nullptr;
711 
712  if( m_pDirMan )
713  m_pDirMan->Finalize();
714  delete m_pDirMan;
715  m_pDirMan = nullptr;
716 
717 
718  if( m_pSceneMan )
719  m_pSceneMan->Finalize();
720  delete m_pSceneMan;
721  m_pSceneMan = nullptr;
722 
723  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_CREATED;
724 
725  }
726  VA_FINALLY
727  {
728  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_FAIL;
729  }
730 }
731 
732 void CVACoreImpl::Finalize()
733 {
734  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
735 
736  //VA_TRACE("Core", __FUNCTION__ << " entry");
737  VA_INFO( "Core", "Finalizing core" );
738 
739  VA_TRY
740  {
741  // Mehrfaches Finialisieren führt nicht zu Fehlern
742  if( m_iState == VA_CORESTATE_CREATED ) return;
743 
744  if( m_iState == VA_CORESTATE_FAIL )
745  VA_EXCEPT2( MODAL_ERROR, "Core corrupted, finalization impossible" );
746 
747  // Core-Thread anhalten (wenn frei ist)
748  while( !m_pCoreThread->TryBreak() )
749  VASleep( 10 );
750  //m_pCoreThread->Break(); << deadlock
751 
752  // Alle Filterketten löschen und warten bis Zustand sicher übernommen
753  // Wichtig: Dies muss vor dem Beenden des Streamings geschehen
754 
755  // Reset audio renderers
756  for( std::vector<CVAAudioRendererDesc>::iterator it = m_voRenderers.begin(); it != m_voRenderers.end(); ++it )
757  it->pInstance->Reset();
758 
759  // Peak-Nachrichten stoppen
760  m_pTicker->StopTicker();
761 
762  // Audio-Streaming beenden
763  m_pAudioDriverBackend->stopStreaming();
764 
765  InitProgress( "Stopping auralization threads", "", 2 );
766 
767  // Stop and delete ticker
768  m_pTicker->SetAfterPulseFunctor( NULL );
769  delete m_pTicker;
770  m_pTicker = NULL;
771 
772  // Hauptthread beenden und freigeben
773  delete m_pCoreThread;
774  m_pCoreThread = nullptr;
775 
776  SetProgress( "Releasing audio hardware", "", 1 );
777  FinalizeAudioDriver();
778  FinalizeRenderingModules();
779  FinalizeReproductionModules();
780 
781  SetProgress( "Cleaning up resources", "", 2 );
782  delete m_pInputAmp;
783  m_pInputAmp = nullptr;
784 
785  delete m_pInputStreamDetector;
786  m_pInputStreamDetector = nullptr;
787 
788  m_voReproductionModules.clear();
789 
790  delete m_pR2RPatchbay;
791  m_pR2RPatchbay = nullptr;
792 
793  delete m_pOutputPatchbay;
794  m_pOutputPatchbay = nullptr;
795 
796  delete m_pOutputStreamDetector;
797  m_pOutputStreamDetector = nullptr;
798 
799  delete m_pOutputTracker;
800  m_pOutputTracker = nullptr;
801 
802  delete m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput;
803  m_pStreamProbeDeviceInput = nullptr;
804 
805  delete m_pStreamProbeFinal;
806  m_pStreamProbeFinal = nullptr;
807 
808  delete m_pSignalSourceMan;
809  m_pSignalSourceMan = nullptr;
810 
811  delete m_pGlobalSampler;
812  m_pGlobalSampler = nullptr;
813 
814  delete m_pGlobalSamplePool;
815  m_pGlobalSamplePool = nullptr;
816 
817  m_pDirMan->Finalize();
818  delete m_pDirMan;
819  m_pDirMan = nullptr;
820 
821  m_pSceneMan->Finalize();
822  delete m_pSceneMan;
823  m_pSceneMan = nullptr;
824 
825  // Finalisierung erfolgreich. Nun wieder im Grundzustand!
826  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_CREATED;
827 
828  FinishProgress();
829 
830  }
831  VA_FINALLY
832  {
833  // Nochmals versuchen aufzuräumen
834  Tidyup();
835 
836  // Allgemein: Fehler beim Finalisieren? => Core im Sack
837  m_iState = VA_CORESTATE_FAIL;
838 
839  // VAExceptions unverändert nach aussen leiten
840  throw;
841  }
842 }

850 void CVACoreImpl::GetModules( std::vector< CVAModuleInfo >& viModuleInfos ) const
851 {
852  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
853  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
854 
855 #if ( VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED == 1 )
856  VA_TRY
857  {
858  std::vector<CVAObjectInfo> v;
859  m_oModules.GetObjectInfos( v );
860 
861  VA_PRINT( "Available modules (" << v.size() << ")" );
862 
863  viModuleInfos.clear();
864  viModuleInfos.resize( v.size() );
865  for( size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++ )
866  {
867  VA_PRINT( "'" << v[ i ].sName << "'\t\t\t" << v[ i ].sDesc );
868  viModuleInfos[ i ].sName = v[ i ].sName;
869  viModuleInfos[ i ].sDesc = v[ i ].sDesc;
870  }
871  }
872  VA_RETHROW;
873 
874 #else // VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED
875 
876  VA_EXCEPT1( "This VACore version does not provide modules" );
877 
878 #endif // VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED
879 
880 }

882 CVAStruct CVACoreImpl::CallModule( const std::string& sModuleName, const CVAStruct& oArgs )
883 {
884  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
885  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
886 
887 #if ( VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED == 1 )
888 
889  VA_TRY
890  {
891  CVAObject* pModule = m_oModules.FindObjectByName( sModuleName );
892  if( !pModule )
893  {
894  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Module '" + sModuleName + "' not found" );
895  }
896 
897 #ifdef VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_MECHANISM_EVENT_BASED
898 
899  CVAEvent ev;
900  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SIGNALSOURCE_STATE_CHANGED;
901  ev.pSender = this;
902  ev.sObjectID = sModuleName;
903  ev;
904  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvent( ev );
905  m_pCoreEventMan->
906 
907 #else // not VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_MECHANISM_EVENT_BASED
908 
909  return pModule->CallObject( oArgs );
910 
911 #endif // VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_MECHANISM_EVENT_BASED
912 
913  }
914  VA_RETHROW;
915 
916 #else // VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED
917 
918 #if ( VACORE_NO_MODULE_INTERFACE_THROW_EXCEPTION == 1 )
919  VA_EXCEPT1( "This VACore version does not provide modules" );
920 #endif // VACORE_NO_MODULE_INTERFACE_THROW_EXCEPTION
921 
922 #endif // VACORE_MODULE_INTERFACE_ENABLED
923 }

925 CVAStruct CVACoreImpl::GetSearchPaths() const
926 {
927  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
928  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
929 
930  CVAStruct oSearchPaths;
931  for( size_t i = 0; i < m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths.size(); i++ )
932  oSearchPaths[ "path_" + std::to_string( long( i ) ) ] = m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ];
933 
934  return oSearchPaths;
935 }
936 
937 CVAStruct CVACoreImpl::GetCoreConfiguration( const bool bFilterEnabled ) const
938 {
939  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
940  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
941 
942  CVAStruct oCoreConfig;
943 
944  if( bFilterEnabled )
945  {
946  CVAStruct::const_iterator cit = m_oCoreConfig.GetStruct().Begin();
947  while( cit != m_oCoreConfig.GetStruct().End() )
948  {
949  const std::string sKey( cit->first );
950  const CVAStructValue& oVal( cit->second );
951  ++cit;
952 
953  if( oVal.IsStruct() )
954  {
955  const CVAStruct& oSection( oVal.GetStruct() );
956  if( oSection.HasKey( "enabled" ) )
957  if( bool( oSection[ "enabled" ] ) == false )
958  continue; // Only skip if explicitly not enabled
959  oCoreConfig[ sKey ] = oVal;
960  }
961  }
962 
963  }
964  else
965  {
966  oCoreConfig = m_oCoreConfig.GetStruct();
967  }
968 
969  return oCoreConfig;
970 }

977 }

979 CVAStruct CVACoreImpl::GetFileList( const bool bRecursive, const std::string& sFileSuffixFilter ) const
980 {
981  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
982  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
983 
984  CVAStruct oFileList;
985  for( size_t i = 0; i < m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths.size(); i++ )
986  {
987  if( bRecursive )
988  {
989  RecursiveFileList( m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ], oFileList, sFileSuffixFilter );
990  }
991  else
992  {
993  std::vector< std::string > vsFileList;
994  FileList( m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ], vsFileList, sFileSuffixFilter );
995 
996  CVAStruct oMoreFiles;
997  for( size_t j = 0; j < vsFileList.size(); j++ )
998  oMoreFiles[ std::to_string( long( j ) ) ] = vsFileList[ j ];
999 
1000  oFileList[ m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ] ] = oMoreFiles;
1001  }
1002  }
1003  return oFileList;
1004 }

1006 int CVACoreImpl::CreateDirectivityFromParameters( const CVAStruct& oParams, const std::string& sName )
1007 {

1019  ev.pSender = this;
1020  ev.iObjectID = iDirID;

1022 
1023  VA_INFO( "Core", "Directivity successfully loaded, assigned directivity ID " << iDirID );
1024 
1025  return iDirID;
1026 
1027  } VA_RETHROW;

1202 std::string CVACoreImpl::CreateSignalSourceBufferFromParameters( const CVAStruct& oParams, const std::string& sName )
1203 {
1204  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
1205  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1206 
1207  VA_TRY
1208  {
1209  if( oParams.HasKey( "filepath" ) )
1210  {
1211  const std::string sFilePath = oParams[ "filepath" ];
1212  const std::string sDestFilePath = FindFilePath( sFilePath );
1213  if( sDestFilePath.empty() )
1214  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Looked everywhere, but could not find file '" + sFilePath + "'" );
1215 
1216  std::string sID = m_pSignalSourceMan->CreateAudiofileSignalSource( sDestFilePath, sName );
1217  assert( !sID.empty() );
1218 
1219  CVAEvent ev;
1220  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SIGNALSOURCE_CREATED;
1221  ev.pSender = this;
1222  ev.sObjectID = sID;
1223  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvent( ev );
1224 
1225  VA_INFO( "Core", "Created audiofile signal source (ID=" << sID << ", Name=\"" << sName << "\", Filename=\"" << sDestFilePath << "\")" );
1226 
1227  return sID;
1228  }
1229  else
1230  {
1231  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Could not interpret parameter arguments to create a buffer signal source" );
1232  }
1233  }
1234  VA_RETHROW;
1235 }

1641 int CVACoreImpl::AddSignalSourceSequencerPlayback( const std::string& sSignalSourceID, const int iSoundID, const int iFlags, const double dTimecode )
1642 {
1643  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
1644  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1645 
1646  IVAAudioSignalSource* pSource = nullptr;
1647 
1648  VA_TRY
1649  {
1650  // Quelle anfordern (prüft auf gültige ID)
1651  pSource = m_pSignalSourceMan->RequestSignalSource( sSignalSourceID );
1652 
1653  // Playbacks kann man nur bei Sequencer-Quellen modifizieren
1654  if( pSource->GetType() != IVAAudioSignalSource::VA_SS_SEQUENCER )
1655  {
1656  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pSource );
1657  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Playbacks can only be added to sequencer signal sources" );
1658  }
1659 
1660  /* TODO:
1661  // Sicherstellen das es eine Sampler ist
1662  if (pSource->GetTypeMnemonic() != "af") {
1663  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource(pSource);
1664  VA_EXCEPT2(INVALID_PARAMETER, "Invalid auralization mode");
1665  }
1666  */
1667 
1668  // Zustand setzen
1669  int iPlaybackID;
1670  try
1671  {
1672  CVASequencerSignalSource* pSamplerSource = dynamic_cast< CVASequencerSignalSource* >( pSource );
1673  iPlaybackID = pSamplerSource->AddSoundPlayback( iSoundID, iFlags, dTimecode );
1674  }
1675  catch( ... )
1676  {
1677  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pSource );
1678  throw;
1679  }
1680 
1681  // Signalquelle freigeben
1682  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pSource );
1683 
1684  VA_INFO( "Core", "Added sound playback (Signal source=" << sSignalSourceID << ", Sound=" << iSoundID << ", Flags=" << iFlags << ", Timecode=" << dTimecode << ")" );
1685 
1686  return iPlaybackID;
1687 
1688  }
1689  VA_FINALLY
1690  {
1691  // Signalquelle freigeben
1692  if( pSource ) m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pSource );
1693 
1694  // VAExceptions unverändert nach aussen leiten
1695  throw;
1696  }
1697 }

1704 
1705 bool CVACoreImpl::GetUpdateLocked() const
1706 {
1707  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1708  return ( m_lSyncModOwner != -1 );
1709 }
1710 
1711 void CVACoreImpl::LockUpdate()
1712 {
1713  m_dSyncEntryTime = m_pClock->getTime();
1714 
1715  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1716  VA_LOCK_REENTRANCE;
1717 
1718  if( m_lSyncModOwner != -1 )
1719  {
1720  // Thread already owner, increment spin counter
1721  if( getCurrentThreadID() == m_lSyncModOwner )
1722  {
1723  ++m_lSyncModSpinCount;
1724  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1725  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Attempt to enter synchronized scene modification ignored - already in a synchronized scene modification" );
1726  return;
1727  }
1728  }
1729 
1730  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1731 
1732  VA_TRACE( "Core", "Beginning synchronized scene modification" );
1733 
1734  /*
1735  * Blocking wait des aufrufenden Thread.
1736  * Wichtig: Dies muss ausserhalb des Reentrance-Lock geschehen,
1737  * da sonst kein anderer Thread mehr auf der Schnittstelle aufrufen kann.
1738  */
1739  m_mxSyncModLock.Lock();
1740 
1741  VA_LOCK_REENTRANCE;
1742 
1743  m_lSyncModOwner = getCurrentThreadID();
1744  ++m_lSyncModSpinCount;
1745 
1746  VA_TRY
1747  {
1748  m_pNewSceneState = m_pSceneMan->CreateDerivedSceneState( m_pSceneMan->GetHeadSceneStateID(), m_dSyncEntryTime );
1749  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1750 
1751  }
1752  VA_FINALLY
1753  {
1754  m_mxSyncModLock.Unlock();
1755  m_lSyncModOwner = -1;
1756  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1757  throw;
1758  }
1759 }
1760 
1761 int CVACoreImpl::UnlockUpdate()
1762 {
1763  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1764  VA_LOCK_REENTRANCE;
1765 
1766  int iNewSceneID = -1;
1767 
1768  VA_TRACE( "Core", "Unlocking scene" );
1769 
1770  // Sicherheitscheck: Gar nicht innerhalb Synchronisation => Fehler
1771  if( m_lSyncModOwner == -1 )
1772  {
1773  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1774  VA_EXCEPT2( MODAL_ERROR, "Not within a synchronized modification phase" );
1775  }
1776 
1777  if( m_lSyncModOwner != getCurrentThreadID() )
1778  {
1779  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1780  VA_EXCEPT2( MODAL_ERROR, "Synchronized modification may only be ended by the same thread that begun it" );
1781  }
1782 
1783  if( --m_lSyncModSpinCount > 0 )
1784  {
1785  // Nicht die letzte Freigabe des Token.
1786  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1787  return -1;
1788  }
1789 
1790  VA_TRY
1791  {
1792  m_pNewSceneState->Fix();
1793 
1794  iNewSceneID = m_pNewSceneState->GetID();
1795  m_pSceneMan->SetHeadSceneState( iNewSceneID );
1796 
1797  m_iNewActiveSoundReceiver = m_iUpdActiveSoundReceiver;
1798 
1799  m_lSyncModOwner = -1;
1800  m_mxSyncModLock.Unlock();
1801 
1802  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1803  }
1804  VA_FINALLY
1805  {
1806  VA_UNLOCK_REENTRANCE;
1807  throw;
1808  }
1809  VA_TRY
1810  {
1811  m_pCoreThread->Trigger();
1812  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvents();
1813  return iNewSceneID;
1814  }
1815  VA_RETHROW;
1816 }
1817

1834 
1835 int CVACoreImpl::CreateSoundSource( const std::string& sName )
1836 {
1837  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
1838  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1839 
1840  const bool bInSyncMode = GetUpdateLocked();
1841  if( !bInSyncMode )
1842  LockUpdate();
1843 
1844  VA_TRY
1845  {
1846  if( ( VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES != 0 ) && m_pNewSceneState )
1847  {
1848  int iSourcesRemain = VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES - m_pNewSceneState->GetNumSoundSources();
1849  if( iSourcesRemain <= 0 )
1850  {
1851  std::stringstream ss;
1852  ss << "Maximum number of sound sources reached. This version of VA only supports up to " << VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES << " sound sources.";
1853  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, ss.str() );
1854  }
1855  }
1856 
1857  // Schallquelle anlegen
1858  int iSourceID = m_pNewSceneState->AddSoundSource();
1859  assert( iSourceID != -1 );
1860 
1861  // HINWEIS: Zunächst hier die statische Beschreibung der Quelle anlegen
1862  CVASoundSourceDesc* pDesc = m_pSceneMan->CreateSoundSourceDesc( iSourceID );
1863 
1864  // Keine Signalquelle zugewiesen. Wichtig: Stillepuffer einsetzen!
1865  pDesc->pSignalSourceInputBuf = m_pSignalSourceMan->GetSilenceBuffer();
1866 
1867  // Initiale Werte setzen
1868  m_pSceneMan->SetSoundSourceName( iSourceID, sName );
1869  CVASoundSourceState* pSourceState = m_pNewSceneState->AlterSoundSourceState( iSourceID );
1870  assert( pSourceState );
1871 
1872  // Ereignis generieren
1873  CVAEvent ev;
1874  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_SOURCE_CREATED;
1875  ev.pSender = this;
1876  ev.iObjectID = iSourceID;
1877  ev.sName = sName;
1878 
1879  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
1880 
1881  if( !bInSyncMode )
1882  UnlockUpdate();
1883 
1884  VA_INFO( "Core", "Created sound source '" << sName << "' and assigned ID " << iSourceID );
1885 
1886  return iSourceID;
1887  }
1888  VA_FINALLY
1889  {
1890  if( bInSyncMode )
1891  UnlockUpdate();
1892 
1893  throw;
1894  }
1895 }
1896 
1897 int CVACoreImpl::CreateSoundSourceExplicitRenderer( const std::string& sRendererID, const std::string& sName )
1898 {
1899  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
1900  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1901 
1902  bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
1903  if( !bSync )
1904  LockUpdate();
1905 
1906  VA_TRY
1907  {
1908  if( ( VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES != 0 ) && m_pNewSceneState )
1909  {
1910  int iSourcesRemain = VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES - m_pNewSceneState->GetNumSoundSources();
1911  if( iSourcesRemain <= 0 )
1912  {
1913  std::stringstream ss;
1914  ss << "Maximum number of sound sources reached. This version of VA only supports up to " << VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_SOURCES << " sound sources.";
1915  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, ss.str() );
1916  }
1917  }
1918 
1919  int iSourceID = m_pNewSceneState->AddSoundSource();
1920  assert( iSourceID != -1 );
1921 
1922  CVASoundSourceDesc* pDesc = m_pSceneMan->CreateSoundSourceDesc( iSourceID );
1923  pDesc->sExplicitRendererID = sRendererID;
1924  pDesc->pSignalSourceInputBuf = m_pSignalSourceMan->GetSilenceBuffer();
1925 
1926  m_pSceneMan->SetSoundSourceName( iSourceID, sName );
1927  CVASoundSourceState* pSourceState = m_pNewSceneState->AlterSoundSourceState( iSourceID );
1928  assert( pSourceState );
1929 
1930  CVAEvent ev;
1931  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_SOURCE_CREATED;
1932  ev.pSender = this;
1933  ev.iObjectID = iSourceID;
1934  ev.sName = sName;
1935  ev.iAuralizationMode = VA_AURAMODE_ALL;
1936  ev.dVolume = 1.0f;
1937  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
1938 
1939  if( !bSync )
1940  UnlockUpdate();
1941 
1942  VA_INFO( "Core", "Created sound receiver '" << sName << "' and assigned ID " << iSourceID << " explicitly for renderer '" << sRendererID << "' only" );
1943 
1944  return iSourceID;
1945  }
1946  VA_FINALLY
1947  {
1948  if( bSync )
1949  UnlockUpdate();
1950  throw;
1951  }
1952 }
1953 
1954 int CVACoreImpl::DeleteSoundSource( const int iSoundSourceID )
1955 {
1956  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
1957  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
1958 
1959  bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
1960  if( !bSync )
1961  LockUpdate();
1962 
1963  VA_TRY
1964  {
1965  m_pNewSceneState->RemoveSoundSource( iSoundSourceID );
1966  int iResult = 0;
1967 
1968  if( iResult == 0 )
1969  {
1970  // Ereignis generieren, wenn erfolgreich
1971  CVAEvent ev;
1972  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_SOURCE_DELETED;
1973  ev.pSender = this;
1974  ev.iObjectID = iSoundSourceID;
1975  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
1976  }
1977 
1978  if( !bSync )
1979  UnlockUpdate();
1980 
1981  VA_INFO( "Core", "Deleted sound source " << iSoundSourceID );
1982 
1983  return iResult;
1984 
1985  }
1986  VA_FINALLY
1987  {
1988  if( !bSync )
1989  UnlockUpdate();
1990  throw;
1991  }
1992 }

2092 void CVACoreImpl::SetSoundSourceSignalSource( int iSoundSourceID, const std::string& sSignalSourceID )
2093 {
2094  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
2095  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
2096 
2097  // Keine Signalquelle zugewiesen. Wichtig: Stillepuffer einsetzen!
2098  IVAAudioSignalSource* pNewSrc( nullptr ); // Neu oder zusätzlich ...
2099  const ITASampleBuffer* pNewBuf( m_pSignalSourceMan->GetSilenceBuffer() );
2100 
2101  VA_TRY
2102  {
2103  CVASoundSourceDesc* pDesc = m_pSceneMan->GetSoundSourceDesc( iSoundSourceID );
2104 
2105  // Sicherstellen, das die Signalquellen ID gültig ist .. dann ID und Qu
2106  if( !sSignalSourceID.empty() )
2107  pNewSrc = m_pSignalSourceMan->RequestSignalSource( sSignalSourceID, &pNewBuf );
2108 
2109  // Vorherige Bindung auflösen und Signalquelle freigeben
2110  if( pDesc->pSignalSource.get() != nullptr )
2111  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pDesc->pSignalSource );
2112 
2113  // Vorhandene Signalquelle zu dieser SoundSource zuordnen (atomare Ops)
2114  pDesc->pSignalSource.set( pNewSrc );
2115  pDesc->pSignalSourceInputBuf.set( pNewBuf );
2116 
2117  // Ereignis generieren
2118  CVAEvent ev;
2119  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_SOURCE_CHANGED_SIGNALSOURCE;
2120  ev.pSender = this;
2121  ev.iObjectID = iSoundSourceID;
2122  ev.sParam = sSignalSourceID;
2123  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
2124 
2125  if( pNewSrc == nullptr )
2126  {
2127  VA_INFO( "Core", "Removed signal source from sound source " << iSoundSourceID << " (now uses silence buffer samples)" );
2128  }
2129  else
2130  {
2131  VA_INFO( "Core", "Set sound source " << iSoundSourceID << " signal source '" << sSignalSourceID << "'" );
2132  }
2133 
2134  return;
2135  }
2136  VA_CATCH( ex )
2137  {
2138  // Referenz auf die neue Signalquelle wieder entfernen
2139  if( pNewSrc )
2140  m_pSignalSourceMan->ReleaseSignalSource( pNewSrc );
2141  throw ex;
2142  }
2143 }

2579 int CVACoreImpl::CreateSoundReceiver( const std::string& sName )
2580 {
2581  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
2582  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
2583 
2584  VA_TRY
2585  {
2586  if( ( VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS != 0 ) && m_pNewSceneState )
2587  {
2588  const int iListenersRemain = VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS - m_pNewSceneState->GetNumListeners();
2589  if( iListenersRemain <= 0 )
2590  {
2591  std::stringstream ss;
2592  ss << "Maximum number of listeners reached. This version of VA only supports up to " << VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS << " listeners.";
2593  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, ss.str() );
2594  }
2595  }
2596 
2597  const bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
2598  if( !bSync )
2599  LockUpdate();
2600 
2601  // Hörer anlegen
2602  const int iID = m_pNewSceneState->AddListener();
2603  assert( iID != -1 );
2604 
2605  // HINWEIS: Zunächst hier die statische Beschreibung der Quelle anlegen
2606  m_pSceneMan->CreateListenerDesc( iID );
2607 
2608  // Initiale Werte setzen
2609  m_pSceneMan->SetListenerName( iID, sName );
2610  CVAListenerState* pListenerState = m_pNewSceneState->AlterListenerState( iID );
2611  assert( pListenerState );
2612 
2613  // INFO: Set the default position/orientation of the new listener
2614  CVAMotionState* pMotionState = pListenerState->AlterMotionState();
2615  pMotionState->SetPosition( VAVec3( 0, 0, 0 ) ); // Really?
2616 
2617  // Ereignis generieren
2618  CVAEvent ev;
2619  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_RECEIVER_CREATED;
2620  ev.pSender = this;
2621  ev.iObjectID = iID;
2622  ev.sName = sName;
2623  SetCoreEventParams( ev, pMotionState );
2624 
2625  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
2626 
2627  if( !bSync )
2628  UnlockUpdate();
2629 
2630  VA_INFO( "Core", "Created sound receiver '" << sName << "' and assigned ID " << iID );
2631 
2632  return iID;
2633 
2634  } VA_RETHROW;
2635 }
2636 
2637 int CVACoreImpl::DeleteSoundReceiver( const int iID )
2638 {
2639  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
2640  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
2641 
2642  bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
2643  if( !bSync )
2644  LockUpdate();
2645 
2646  VA_TRY
2647  {
2648  if( iID == m_iCurActiveSoundReceiver )
2649  {
2650  UnlockUpdate();
2651  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Cannot delete a sound receiver that is set as active sound receiver" );
2652  }
2653 
2654  m_pNewSceneState->RemoveListener( iID );
2655  // Ereignis generieren, falls erfolgreich
2656  CVAEvent ev;
2657  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_RECEIVER_DELETED;
2658  ev.pSender = this;
2659  ev.iObjectID = iID;
2660  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
2661 
2662  if( !bSync )
2663  UnlockUpdate();
2664 
2665  VA_INFO( "Core", "Deleted sound receiver " << iID );
2666 
2667  return 0;
2668  }
2669  VA_RETHROW;
2670 }

2677 int CVACoreImpl::CreateSoundReceiverExplicitRenderer( const std::string& sRendererID, const std::string& sName )
2678 {
2679  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
2680  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
2681 
2682  bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
2683  if( !bSync )
2684  LockUpdate();
2685 
2686  VA_TRY
2687  {
2688  if( ( VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS != 0 ) && m_pNewSceneState )
2689  {
2690  int iListenersRemain = VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS - m_pNewSceneState->GetNumListeners();
2691  if( iListenersRemain <= 0 )
2692  {
2693  std::stringstream ss;
2694  ss << "Maximum number of listeners reached. This version of VA only supports up to " << VACORE_MAX_NUM_SOUND_RECEIVERS << " listeners.";
2695  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, ss.str() );
2696  }
2697  }
2698 
2699  int iListenerID = m_pNewSceneState->AddListener();
2700  assert( iListenerID != -1 );
2701 
2702  CVAListenerDesc* pDesc = m_pSceneMan->CreateListenerDesc( iListenerID );
2703  pDesc->sExplicitRendererID = sRendererID;
2704 
2705  m_pSceneMan->SetListenerName( iListenerID, sName );
2706  CVAListenerState* pListenerState = m_pNewSceneState->AlterListenerState( iListenerID );
2707  assert( pListenerState );
2708 
2709  CVAEvent ev;
2710  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_RECEIVER_CREATED;
2711  ev.pSender = this;
2712  ev.iObjectID = iListenerID;
2713  ev.sName = sName;
2714  ev.iAuralizationMode = VA_AURAMODE_ALL;
2715  ev.dVolume = 1.0f;
2716  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
2717 
2718  if( !bSync )
2719  UnlockUpdate();
2720 
2721  VA_INFO( "Core", "Created sound receiver (ID=" << iListenerID << ", Name=\"" << sName << "\") explicitly for renderer '" << sRendererID << "' only" );
2722 
2723  return iListenerID;
2724  }
2725  VA_FINALLY
2726  {
2727  if( bSync )
2728  UnlockUpdate();
2729  throw;
2730  }
2731 }

2946 void CVACoreImpl::SetSoundReceiverDirectivity( const int iID, const int iDirectivityID )
2947 {
2948  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
2949  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
2950 
2951  VA_TRY
2952  {
2953  // Parameter überprüfen
2954  const IVADirectivity* pDirectivity = nullptr;
2955  if( iDirectivityID != -1 )
2956  {
2957  pDirectivity = m_pDirMan->RequestDirectivity( iDirectivityID );
2958  if( !pDirectivity )
2959  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_ID, "Invalid directivity dataset for ID " + std::to_string( iID ) );
2960  }
2961 
2962  bool bSync = GetUpdateLocked();
2963  if( !bSync )
2964  LockUpdate();
2965 
2966  CVAListenerState* pListenerState = m_pNewSceneState->AlterListenerState( iID );
2967 
2968  if( !pListenerState )
2969  {
2970  // Quelle existiert nicht
2971  if( !bSync )
2972  UnlockUpdate();
2973 
2974  if( pDirectivity )
2975  m_pDirMan->DeleteDirectivity( iDirectivityID );
2976 
2977  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Invalid sound receiver ID " + std::to_string( iID ) );
2978  }
2979 
2980  pListenerState->SetDirectivityID( iDirectivityID );
2981  pListenerState->SetDirectivity( pDirectivity );
2982 
2983  // Ereignis generieren, falls erfolgreich
2984  CVAEvent ev;
2985  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_SOUND_RECEIVER_CHANGED_DIRECTIVITY;
2986  ev.pSender = this;
2987  ev.iObjectID = iID;
2988  ev.iParamID = iDirectivityID;
2989  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
2990 
2991  if( !bSync )
2992  UnlockUpdate();
2993 
2994  VA_INFO( "Core", "Linked sound receiver " + std::to_string( long( iID ) ) + " with HRIR dataset " + std::to_string( long( iDirectivityID ) ) );
2995 
2996  }
2997  VA_RETHROW;
2998 }

3761 void CVACoreImpl::SetActiveSoundReceiver( const int iListenerID )
3762 {
3763  VA_NO_REENTRANCE;
3764  VA_CHECK_INITIALIZED;
3765 
3766  bool bSync = false;
3767 
3768  VA_TRY
3769  {
3770  LockUpdate();
3771  bSync = true;
3772 
3773  // Prüfen, ob Hörer in der aktuellen Konfig existiert.
3774  if( !m_pNewSceneState->GetListenerState( iListenerID ) )
3775  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Listener does not existing in head configuration" );
3776  /* TODO: Auch -1 erlauben um Hörer zu entfernen
3777  if (iListenerID != -1) {
3778  if (!m_pNewSceneState->GetListenerState(iListenerID))
3779  VA_EXCEPT2(INVALID_PARAMETER, "Listener does not existing in head configuration");
3780  }
3781  */
3782 
3783  if( iListenerID != m_iUpdActiveSoundReceiver )
3784  {
3785  m_iUpdActiveSoundReceiver = iListenerID;
3786  m_iCurActiveSoundReceiver = iListenerID;
3787 
3788  // Ereignis generieren
3789  CVAEvent ev;
3790  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_ACTIVE_SOUND_RECEIVER_CHANGED;
3791  ev.pSender = this;
3792  ev.iObjectID = iListenerID;
3793  m_pCoreEventMan->EnqueueEvent( ev );
3794 
3795  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Set sound receiver " << iListenerID << " the active listener" );
3796  }
3797 
3798  bSync = false;
3799  UnlockUpdate();
3800 
3801  }
3802  VA_FINALLY
3803  {
3804  if( bSync ) UnlockUpdate();
3805  throw;
3806  }
3807 }

3817 void CVACoreImpl::SetCoreClock( const double dSeconds )
3818 {

3822  VA_TRY

3825  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "Time must not be negative" );
3826 
3827  // Aktuelle Zeit holen

3829  double dOffset = dSeconds - dNow;

3849 std::string CVACoreImpl::FindFilePath( const std::string& sRelativeFilePath ) const
3850 {
3851  VA_TRY
3852  {
3853  std::string sRelativeFilePathSubstituted = SubstituteMacros( sRelativeFilePath );
3854  VistaFileSystemFile oFile( sRelativeFilePathSubstituted );
3855  if( oFile.Exists() && oFile.IsFile() )
3856  return sRelativeFilePathSubstituted;
3857 
3858  // Search with paths list
3859  std::string sFinalPathWithSearch;
3860  for( size_t i = 0; i < m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths.size(); i++ )
3861  {
3862  const std::string& sSearchPath( m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ] );
3863  std::string sCombinedFilePath = correctPath( sSearchPath + PATH_SEPARATOR + sRelativeFilePathSubstituted );
3864  VistaFileSystemFile oFile( sCombinedFilePath );
3865  VA_TRACE( "Core:FindFilePath", "Searching in directory '" + sSearchPath + "' for file '" + sRelativeFilePathSubstituted + "'" );
3866  if( oFile.Exists() && oFile.IsFile() )
3867  {
3868  if( sFinalPathWithSearch.empty() )
3869  {
3870  sFinalPathWithSearch = sCombinedFilePath;
3871  }
3872  else
3873  {
3874  VA_WARN( "Core", "Found ambiguous file path '" + sCombinedFilePath + "' (skipped), using first path '" + sFinalPathWithSearch + "'" );
3875  }
3876  }
3877 
3878  }
3879  return sFinalPathWithSearch;
3880  }
3881  VA_RETHROW;
3882 }
3883 
3884 void CVACoreImpl::InitializeAudioDriver()
3885 {
3886 #ifdef VACORE_WITH_AUDIO_BACKEND_ASIO
3887  if( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDriver == "ASIO" )
3888  m_pAudioDriverBackend = new CVAASIOBackend( &m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig );
3889 #endif
3890 #ifdef VACORE_WITH_AUDIO_BACKEND_PORTAUDIO
3891  if( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDriver == "Portaudio" )
3892  m_pAudioDriverBackend = new CVAPortaudioBackend( &m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig );
3893 #endif
3894 #ifdef VACORE_WITH_AUDIO_BACKEND_DUMMY
3895  if( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDriver == "Dummy" )
3896  m_pAudioDriverBackend = new CVADummyBackend( &m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig );
3897 #endif
3898 
3899  if( m_pAudioDriverBackend == nullptr )
3900  VA_ERROR( "Core", "Unkown or unsupported audio driver backend '" << m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDriver << "'" );
3901 
3902  try
3903  {
3904  VA_INFO( "Core", "Initializing audio device '" << m_pAudioDriverBackend->getDeviceName() << "' using '" << m_pAudioDriverBackend->getDriverName() << "' driver" );
3905 
3906  VA_TRACE( "Core", "Desired settings: sampling rate " << m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate << " Hz, " <<
3907  ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels == CVAAudioDriverConfig::AUTO ? "all" : std::to_string( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels ) ) << " inputs, " <<
3908  ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels == CVAAudioDriverConfig::AUTO ? "all" : std::to_string( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels ) ) << " outputs, " <<
3909  "buffer size = " << ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize == 0 ? "auto" : std::to_string( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize ) ) );
3910 
3911  m_pAudioDriverBackend->initialize();
3912 
3913  m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate = m_pAudioDriverBackend->getOutputStreamProperties()->dSamplerate;
3914  m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels = m_pAudioDriverBackend->getNumberOfInputs();
3915  m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels = m_pAudioDriverBackend->getOutputStreamProperties()->uiChannels;
3916  m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize = m_pAudioDriverBackend->getOutputStreamProperties()->uiBlocklength;
3917 
3918  VA_INFO( "Core", "Streaming at " << std::fixed << std::setw( 3 ) << std::setprecision( 1 ) << ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.dSampleRate / 1000.0f ) << " kHz on " <<
3919  ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels == 0 ? "no" : std::to_string( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels ) ) << " inputs and " <<
3920  ( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels == 0 ? "no" : std::to_string( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iOutputChannels ) ) <<
3921  " outputs with a buffer size of " << m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iBuffersize << " samples." );
3922 
3923  }
3924  catch( ... )
3925  {
3926  m_pAudioDriverBackend->finalize();
3927 
3928  delete m_pAudioDriverBackend;
3929  m_pAudioDriverBackend = nullptr;
3930 
3931  throw;
3932  }
3933 }
3934 
3935 void CVACoreImpl::FinalizeAudioDriver()
3936 {
3937  if( m_pAudioDriverBackend )
3938  {
3939  VA_INFO( "Core", "Finalizing audio device \"" << m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDevice <<
3940  "\" [" << m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.sDriver << "]" );
3941

3979  const CVAStruct& oArgs( cit->second );

3990  conf.SetErrorPrefix( "Configuration error in section \"" + cit->first + "\"" );

3999  continue; // Skip

4234 void CVACoreImpl::PatchRendererToReproductionModules()
4235 {
4236  std::vector<CVAAudioRendererDesc>::iterator rendit = m_voRenderers.begin();
4237  while( rendit != m_voRenderers.end() )
4238  {
4239  const CVAAudioRendererDesc& renddesc( *rendit );
4240  int iRendererNumOutputChannels = renddesc.pInstance->GetOutputDatasource()->GetNumberOfChannels();
4241  int iRendererR2RPatchBayInput = renddesc.iR2RPatchBayInput;
4242 
4243  // Iterate over all target reproduction modules
4244  std::vector< std::string >::const_iterator ocit = renddesc.vsOutputs.begin();
4245  while( ocit != renddesc.vsOutputs.end() )
4246  {
4247  const std::string& sTargetReproductionModule( *ocit );
4248 
4249  std::vector< CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc >::const_iterator repcit = m_voReproductionModules.begin();
4250  while( repcit != m_voReproductionModules.end() )
4251  {
4252  const CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc& repdesc( *repcit );
4253  if( repdesc.sID == sTargetReproductionModule )
4254  {
4255  // Get R2R patch bay output of target reproduction module and patch channels from renderer input
4256  for( int k = 0; k < iRendererNumOutputChannels; k++ )
4257  m_pR2RPatchbay->ConnectChannels( iRendererR2RPatchBayInput, k, repdesc.iR2RPatchBayOutput, k );
4258 
4259  break; // break after target reproduction module is patched and continue with next
4260  }
4261  repcit++;
4262  }
4263  ocit++;
4264  }
4265  rendit++;
4266  }
4267 
4268  return;
4269 }

4271 void CVACoreImpl::PatchReproductionModulesToOutput()
4272 {
4273  int iMaxPhysicalChannelsAvailable = m_pOutputPatchbay->GetOutputNumChannels( 0 );
4274 
4275  std::vector<CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc>::iterator it = m_voReproductionModules.begin();
4276  while( it != m_voReproductionModules.end() )
4277  {
4278  CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc& oRepDesc( *it );
4279 
4280  std::vector< const CVAHardwareOutput* >::iterator jt = oRepDesc.vpOutputs.begin();
4281  while( jt != oRepDesc.vpOutputs.end() )
4282  {
4283  const CVAHardwareOutput* pOutput( *jt );
4284 
4285  // Only consider outputs for patching, that are set enabled via configuration
4286  if( pOutput->IsEnabled() == false )
4287  {
4288  jt++;
4289  continue;
4290  }
4291 
4292  for( size_t k = 0; k < pOutput->GetPhysicalOutputChannels().size(); k++ )
4293  {
4294  int iPhysicalOutputChannel = pOutput->GetPhysicalOutputChannels()[ k ] - 1;
4295  if( iPhysicalOutputChannel < iMaxPhysicalChannelsAvailable )
4296  m_pOutputPatchbay->ConnectChannels( oRepDesc.iOutputPatchBayInput, int( k ), 0, iPhysicalOutputChannel );
4297  else
4298  VA_EXCEPT2( INVALID_PARAMETER, "VACore/ConnectRendererWithReproductionModules: Group '" +
4299  pOutput->sIdentifier + "' output channel out of range for this sound card" );
4300  }
4301  jt++;
4302  }
4303  it++;
4304  }
4305 
4306  return;
4307 }

4328 void CVACoreImpl::FolderList( const std::string& sBasePath, std::vector< std::string >& vsFolderList ) const
4329 {
4330  vsFolderList.clear();
4331 
4332  VistaFileSystemDirectory oFolder( sBasePath );
4333  if( !oFolder.Exists() || !oFolder.IsDirectory() )
4334  return;
4335 
4336  VistaFileSystemDirectory::const_iterator cit = oFolder.begin();
4337  while( cit != oFolder.end() )
4338  {
4339  VistaFileSystemNode* pNode( *cit++ );
4340  if( pNode->IsDirectory() && pNode->GetLocalName() != "." && pNode->GetLocalName() != ".." )
4341  vsFolderList.push_back( pNode->GetName() );
4342  }
4343 }
4344 
4345 void CVACoreImpl::FileList( const std::string& sBasePath, std::vector< std::string >& vsFileList, const std::string& sFileSuffixMask ) const
4346 {
4347  vsFileList.clear();
4348 
4349  VistaFileSystemDirectory oFolder( sBasePath );
4350  if( !oFolder.Exists() || !oFolder.IsDirectory() )
4351  return;
4352 
4353  VistaFileSystemDirectory::const_iterator cit = oFolder.begin();
4354  while( cit != oFolder.end() )
4355  {
4356  VistaFileSystemNode* pNode( *cit++ );
4357  if( pNode->IsFile() )
4358  {
4359  const std::string sFileName = pNode->GetLocalName();
4360  if( sFileSuffixMask != "*" && !sFileSuffixMask.empty() )
4361  {
4362  if( sFileName.substr( sFileName.find_last_of( "." ) + 1 ).compare( sFileSuffixMask ) )
4363  vsFileList.push_back( pNode->GetName() );
4364  }
4365  else
4366  vsFileList.push_back( pNode->GetName() );
4367  }
4368  }
4369 }

4430 /* +----------------------------------------------------------+ *
4431  * | | *
4432  * | Core-Thread | *
4433  * | | *
4434  * +----------------------------------------------------------+ */
4435 
4436 void CVACoreImpl::CoreThreadLoop()
4437 {
4438  m_pmCoreThreadLoopTotalDuration.start();
4439 
4440  assert( m_pCurSceneState != nullptr );
4441  assert( m_pCurSceneState->GetNumReferences() >= 1 );
4442 
4443  // Auf Änderungen der Szene überprüfen
4444  CVASceneState* pNewSceneState = m_pSceneMan->GetHeadSceneState();
4445 
4446  assert( pNewSceneState != nullptr );
4447  assert( pNewSceneState->GetNumReferences() >= 1 );
4448 
4449  pNewSceneState->AddReference();
4450 
4451  // TODO: Aktiver Hörer wird erstmal ignoriert.
4452  //int iNewActiveListener = m_iNewActiveListener;
4453 
4454  if( pNewSceneState != m_pCurSceneState )
4455  {
4456  VA_TRACE( "CoreThread", "Update scene state " << m_pCurSceneState->GetID() << " -> " << pNewSceneState->GetID() );
4457 
4458  // Audio renderer
4459  std::vector< CVAAudioRendererDesc >::iterator rendit = m_voRenderers.begin();
4460  while( rendit != m_voRenderers.end() )
4461  {
4462  CVAAudioRendererDesc& rendesc( *rendit );
4463  rendesc.pInstance->UpdateScene( pNewSceneState );
4464  rendit++;
4465  }
4466 
4467  // Audio reproduction modules
4468  std::vector< CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc >::iterator repit = m_voReproductionModules.begin();
4469  while( repit != m_voReproductionModules.end() )
4470  {
4471  CVAAudioReproductionModuleDesc& repdesc( *repit );
4472  repdesc.pInstance->UpdateScene( pNewSceneState );
4473  repit++;
4474  }
4475  }
4476 
4477 
4478  // Änderung des globalen Auralisierungsmodus in den Schallpfaden berücksichtigen
4483  std::vector< CVAAudioRendererDesc >::iterator rendit = m_voRenderers.begin();
4484  while( rendit != m_voRenderers.end() )
4485  {
4486  CVAAudioRendererDesc& rendesc( *rendit );
4487  rendesc.pInstance->UpdateGlobalAuralizationMode( m_iGlobalAuralizationMode );
4488 
4489  rendit++;
4490  }
4491 
4492  // Referenzen verwalten: Alter Szenezustand wird nun nicht mehr benötigt
4493  if( m_pCurSceneState != pNewSceneState )
4494  {
4495  // Alter Zustand wird nicht mehr benötigt
4496  m_pCurSceneState->RemoveReference();
4497 
4498  // Aktuelle Szene ist nun die neu erzeugte (abgeleitete) Szene
4499  m_pCurSceneState = pNewSceneState;
4500  }
4501  else
4502  {
4503  // Remove reference of new/current state again
4504  pNewSceneState->RemoveReference();
4505  }
4506 
4507  m_pmCoreThreadLoopTotalDuration.stop();
4508 
4509  // @todo: signal event to process object calls (in-sync exec with internal core)
4510 
4511  return;
4512 }
4513 
4514 void CVACoreImpl::SendAudioDeviceDetectorUpdateEvent()
4515 {
4516  CVAEvent ev;
4517  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_MEASURES_UPDATE;
4518  ev.pSender = this;
4519 
4520  if( m_pInputStreamDetector )
4521  {
4522  ev.vfInputPeaks.resize( m_oCoreConfig.oAudioDriverConfig.iInputChannels );
4523  m_pInputStreamDetector->GetPeaks( ev.vfInputPeaks, true );
4524  }
4525 
4526  if( m_pOutputStreamDetector )
4527  {

4540 void CVACoreImpl::SendRenderingModuleOutputDetectorsUpdateEvents()
4541 {
4542  for( size_t i = 0; i < m_voRenderers.size(); i++ )
4543  {
4544  CVAAudioRendererDesc& oRenderer( m_voRenderers[ i ] );
4545 
4546  CVAEvent ev;
4547  ev.iEventType = CVAEvent::VA_EVENT_MEASURES_UPDATE;
4548  ev.pSender = this;
4549  ev.sObjectID = oRenderer.sID;
4550  ev.sParam = "RenderingModule"; // Use generic parameter slot to mark rendering module source
4551 
4552  if( oRenderer.pOutputDetector )
4553  {
4554  ev.vfOutputPeaks.resize( oRenderer.pOutputDetector->GetNumberOfChannels() );
4555  oRenderer.pOutputDetector->GetPeaks( ev.vfOutputPeaks, true );
4556  }
4557 
4558  m_pCoreEventMan->BroadcastEvent( ev );
4559  }
4560 }

4590 bool CVACoreImpl::operator()()
4591 {
4592 #ifndef DO_NOT_SEND_MEASURE_UPDATE_EVENTS
4593 
4594  // Audio device I/O detectors
4595  SendAudioDeviceDetectorUpdateEvent();
4596 
4597  // Rendering module output detectors
4598  SendRenderingModuleOutputDetectorsUpdateEvents();
4599 
4600  // Rerproduction module I/O detectors
4601  SendReproductionModuleOIDetectorsUpdateEvents();
4602 
4603  return true;
4604 #else
4605  return false;
4606 #endif
4607 }

4618 // Handle calls to the kernel from the module interface
4619 CVAStruct CVACoreImpl::CallObject( const CVAStruct& oArgs )
4620 {
4621  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Core module has been called" );
4622  CVAStruct oReturn;
4623 
4624  if( oArgs.HasKey( "help" ) || oArgs.HasKey( "info" ) || oArgs.IsEmpty() )
4625  {
4626  oReturn[ "help" ] = "Get comprehensive help online at http://www.virtualacoustics.org ...";
4627  oReturn[ "version" ] = "Returns version information";
4628  oReturn[ "addsearchpath" ] = "Adds a search path";
4629  oReturn[ "getsearchpaths" ] = "Returns all search paths";
4630  oReturn[ "getloglevel" ] = "Returns current core log level (integer)";
4631  oReturn[ "setloglevel" ] = "Sets current core log level (integer)";
4632  oReturn[ "structrebound" ] = "Rebounds argument of any content to client (for testing VA structs)";
4633  }
4634 
4635  if( oArgs.HasKey( "version" ) )
4636  {
4637  CVAVersionInfo oVersionInfo;
4638  GetVersionInfo( &oVersionInfo );
4639  oReturn[ "comments" ] = oVersionInfo.sComments;
4640  oReturn[ "date" ] = oVersionInfo.sDate;
4641  oReturn[ "flags" ] = oVersionInfo.sFlags;
4642  oReturn[ "version" ] = oVersionInfo.sVersion;
4643  oReturn[ "string" ] = oVersionInfo.ToString();
4644  }
4645 
4646  if( oArgs.HasKey( "addsearchpath" ) )
4647  {
4648  if( oArgs[ "addsearchpath" ].IsString() )
4649  {
4650  std::string sPath = oArgs[ "addsearchpath" ];
4651  VistaFileSystemDirectory oDir( sPath );
4652  oReturn[ "pathvalid" ] = false;
4653  if( oDir.Exists() )
4654  {
4655  m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths.push_back( sPath );
4656  oReturn[ "pathvalid" ] = true;
4657  }
4658  }
4659  }
4660 
4661  if( oArgs.HasKey( "getsearchpaths" ) )
4662  {
4663  CVAStruct oSearchPaths;
4664  for( size_t i = 0; i < m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths.size(); i++ )
4665  oSearchPaths[ "path_" + std::to_string( long( i ) ) ] = m_oCoreConfig.vsSearchPaths[ i ];
4666  oReturn[ "searchpaths" ] = oSearchPaths;
4667  }
4668 
4669  if( oArgs.HasKey( "getloglevel" ) )
4670  {
4671  oReturn[ "loglevel" ] = VALog_GetLogLevel();
4672  }
4673 
4674  if( oArgs.HasKey( "setloglevel" ) )
4675  {
4676  int iLogLevel = oArgs[ "setloglevel" ];
4677  VALog_SetLogLevel( iLogLevel );
4678  }
4679  if( oArgs.HasKey( "structrebound" ) )
4680  {
4681  oReturn = oArgs[ "structrebound" ];
4682  }
4683 
4684  VA_VERBOSE( "Core", "Core module will transmit answer now" );
4685  return oReturn;
4686 }
